name: Epic Dumpster Bear: Dumpster Fire Redux
description: An evil corporation destroyed his forest, now it's his turn to take out the trash
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1320 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
